answerText: Joaquim Maria Machado de Assis[10] Machado de Assis also wrote this novel about a character who goes backwards in time on a hippopotamus and who loses his putative wife, Virgilia, and writes this novel after his death.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | UC San Diego and Washington University and Chicago B | 18 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: He criticized Eça de Queiroz's O Primo Basílio in Dragon's Teeth.  [10] Name this author of Portuguese language short stories such as "Midnight Mass" as well as a novel about a man who calls himself an Othello and who falls in love with Capitu, Dom Casmurro.
